-Did you notice how friendly he was? -Yes, you're friends with Poirot.
translation.de: -Und er war so freundlich. -Ja, du bist mit Poirot befreundet.

translation.en: Well done.
We had no option.
Daddy had to engage in a role-playing game with strangers.

translation.en: I honestly think he'd rather have been poisoned by the butler.

translation.en: You've sorted these drinks?
-Everyone's served? -Yes, everything's perfect.
-Good evening, vicar. -Good evening.
-Hello, milady. -Good evening, Simon.
In tonight's murder mystery,
all the hotel guests were joining in,
pretending to be characters they'd been allocated.
translation.de: und spielen die ihnen zugeteilten Figuren.

translation.en: A company of actors would perform key scenes
and then mingle with the hotel guests, dropping clues as they go.

translation.en: Everyone's task was to figure out who the murderer was,

translation.en: which we would find out at the end of the evening.
translation.de: und am Ende gibt es die große Enthüllung.

translation.en: Leading the scenes tonight were…
Good evening, everyone.
…the lady of the house,
the vicar,
the maid,
the man with a gin and tonic and, of course, the policeman.
translation.de: der Mann mit dem Gin Tonic und natürlich der Polizist.

translation.en: A bit heavy underfoot, that one.
She wouldn't be very good doing Footsteps in the Fog
translation.de: Sie wäre nicht gut für Schritte im Nebel

translation.en: or one of those murder mysteries.
Like a horse coming in.
Clomping in here, no?
I think that vicar's very dodgy.
The one over there.
I'm pretty sure he's wearing a wig.

translation.en: And I would never trust a man with a wig.
translation.de: Männern mit Perücke würde ich nie trauen.

translation.en: You're telling me that in a false moustache.
Also, he's not a real vicar.

translation.en: -Isn't he? -No, they're actors.
Oh, I see.
You haven't really understood the concept of this.

translation.en: -[Michael] That's straight vodka. -[Jack snickers]
-It is. -[Jack] He's a drunk, creepy vicar.
Maybe that's why he commits his horrific crimes.
translation.de: Vielleicht begeht er die Verbrechen deshalb.

translation.en: Or sex.
Definitely. Sex murderer.
translation.de: Er ist auf jeden Fall ein Sextäter.

translation.en: I smelled that vodka on his breath when he came at me in the stables.
translation.de: Er roch nach Wodka, als er mir in den Stall folgte.

translation.en: At the moment, he's…
-[Jack] Prime suspect. -He would be my prime suspect.
The idea of immersive theater was lost on Daddy,
translation.de: Daddy verstand das immersive Theater nicht.

translation.en: who only seemed immersed in his own confusion.
translation.de: Er war einfach nur vollkommen verwirrt.

translation.en: Perhaps a spot of backstory would help.
Welcome to my beautiful home.
We're here tonight to talk about our dear old friend, Rose Dimper.
translation.de: Wir reden heute über unsere alte Freundin, Rose Dimper.

translation.en: [softly] Who the fuck is Rose Dimples?
[mumbling] Shut up. She's speaking.
We learn that a local resident has passed away

translation.en: and left all her money to the villagers.
translation.de: und ihr Geld dem Dorf hinterlassen hat.

translation.en: Sorry to have to interrupt you, Mrs. Buffy.
Your husband…
He's dead.
We then learn Buffy's husband had huge debts and a secret child.
translation.de: Wir erfahren, dass Mrs. Buffys Mann Schulden und ein heimliches Kind hatte.

translation.en: So the hunt for the killer was on.
That vicar has definitely got the hots for the lady of the house.
translation.de: Der Pfarrer steht auf jeden Fall auf die Hausherrin.

translation.en: Mark my words.
I must ask none of you to leave the island.
translation.de: Keiner von Ihnen darf die Insel verlassen.

translation.en: [Michael] Right, let's get this over with.
[mimics French accent] Constable, there is no need for any of this.
translation.de: Constable, das ist alles nicht nötig.

translation.en: That is the man you want.
The randy vicar!
Slightly jumped the gun there on the denouement.

translation.en: -We haven't had any of the clues yet. -Oh, right, sorry.
It's fine, carry on. As you were. Sorry.

translation.en: While Poirot worked on another theory, it was the stable boy's time to shine.

translation.en: -Simon, can I talk to you? -Oh, yeah.
-You know who I blame, don't you? -Yes?
Harry the gardener.
He was the one who put the nail in the chair.
translation.de: Er schlug den Nagel in den Stuhl.

translation.en: I mean, I asked him to, but…
translation.de: Na ja, ich bat ihn darum, aber…

translation.en: I didn't ask him to stick it out, did I?
No, no, you didn't. Maybe I should look for a new gardener.
translation.de: -Nein, das stimmt. -Ich brauche einen neuen Gärtner.

translation.en: Okay, I'll leave you to it. I'm still in shock at the moment.
translation.de: Gut, ich gehe. Ich stehe noch unter Schock.

translation.en: Yeah.
I think some people are going to get arrested for over-acting.
translation.de: Man kann auch für übertriebene Schauspielerei verhaftet werden.

translation.en: I think, if that's a crime, you're going away for life.
I think I'm in there with the lady.
Oh, Jack, she's a widow.
translation.de: Oh, Jack, sie ist eine Witwe.

translation.en: A WILF.
What's a WILF?
A WILF.
A widow I'd like--
Ladies and gentlemen. Dinner is served in the dining room.
translation.de: Meine Damen und Herren. Das Dinner ist angerichtet.

translation.en: I have a new suspect.
He sounded Russian to me, that bloke.
That's the man that checked us in. He actually works at the hotel.
translation.de: Das ist der Mann, der fürs Hotel arbeitet.

translation.en: [softly] Probably slipped him some polonium.
-Hello. -Hello.
Daddy was still on the case.
The case of finding out how pissed you can get in the course of a murder mystery.
translation.de: …bei seinem Versuch, herauszufinden, wie betrunken man werden kann.

translation.en: Oh God!
I think the great Hercule Poirot may have got that one wrong.
translation.de: Der große Hercule Poirot liegt wohl falsch.

translation.en: What are you doing?
-What are you doing? -I'm just checking.
-He's dead. -He is dead.
The vicar is dead,
your prime suspect.
Yes. Oh…
Disappointing.
Poor vicar. Oh, look. He's left his Bible.
translation.de: Der arme Pfarrer. Oh, guck. Seine Bibel.

translation.en: -Oh, my goodness! -Oh God.
-Cecil! -[Michael groans]
-Madam Faff. -[Lady Buffy] Oh, PC Bailey, quick! Quick!
I'm starting to think we should have been concentrating harder on the clues.

translation.en: -I think we can rule out the vicar. -Yeah.
Well, I changed my mind about him.
translation.de: Ich habe meine Meinung über ihn geändert.

translation.en: -Oh, had you? -Yeah.
-What, when you saw him dead in his salad? -Yeah, I mean, obviously…
translation.de: -Als du seine Leiche gesehen hast? -Ja, ich meine…

translation.en: Nobody leaves the island until I solve this.
translation.de: Niemand verlässt die Insel, bis der Fall gelöst ist.

translation.en: Poor vicar.
I picked up his Bible.
I thought we could maybe read some passages later in our room.
translation.de: Ich dachte, wir könnten später in unserem Zimmer darin lesen.

translation.en: Do you think when he stands up--
-It's not actually a Bible. -What is it?
It's Alan Sugar's autobiography.
-Bear the thought… -The plot thickens.
Probably topped himself reading it.
translation.de: Er hat sich beim Lesen das Leben genommen.

translation.en: Whilst we tucked into our main course, the suspects were working the room.
translation.de: Während des Hauptgerichts gingen die Verdächtigen herum.

translation.en: -Hello, Simon. -Oh, hello.
-Good evening, sir. -Good evening.
-Oh, I do like your moustache. -Oh, thank you.
-Charming. -Can I take your plate for you?
Yes. Thank you very much.
Yes, Simon,
I think I do know who it is.
translation.de: ich glaube, ich weiß, wer es ist.

translation.en: It's Buffy, you know?
Yes, she's having an affair.
-No! -No…
I've seen Gino coming down the back stairs late at night, you know?
translation.de: Gino kam spätnachts die Hintertreppe herunter.

translation.en: What, he had her up the back stairs?
In her bedroom, yes.
Anyway, I think I've said too much now. I'd better go.
translation.de: Ich habe zu viel gesagt. Ich muss gehen.

translation.en: I think you've said too much.
All guests had noted down their prime suspect,
translation.de: Alle Gäste schrieben ihren Verdacht auf.

translation.en: and it was time to find out who had got it right.
translation.de: Dann wollten wir herausfinden, wer recht hatte.

translation.en: [PC Bailey] Kate, over here.
[Jack] Oh, po-po.
Denouement, denouement!
From the clues that I've seen,
I believe I know who the murderer is.
didn't love her husband as much as we thought she did.
translation.de: liebte ihren Mann weniger, als wir dachten.

translation.en: In fact, she's been having an affair with Gino. And she was putting it on me.
translation.de: -Sie hatte sogar eine Affäre mit Gino. -Und hat sich an mich rangemacht.

translation.en: And she was putting it on him.
translation.de: Und hat sich an ihn rangemacht.

translation.en: All over me like a rash.
But I still don't think she's the murderer.
translation.de: Aber sie ist nicht die Mörderin.

translation.en: The person I believe it is
is Kate.
No!
Whatever gave you that idea?
Oh my God.
Because you were the only one
with a key to the trophy cabinet that had the poison in it.
Oh! Boom!
With that plot twist, the mystery was wrapped up. No one could piss on this parade.
translation.de: Damit war das Geheimnis gelüftet. Niemand konnte mehr dazwischenfunken.

translation.en: -Where are you off to, Poirot? -What?
[mimics French accent] The great Poirot
has the answer to this.
He's had too much champagne.
You are an oaf.
It is quite clear this woman is plainly innocent.
translation.de: Es ist klar, dass diese Frau unschuldig ist.

translation.en: The woman that you need to find is this woman here!
translation.de: Die Frau, nach der wir suchen, ist diese Frau hier!

translation.en: -Oh no, you've got it wrong! -The great Poirot knows.
translation.de: -Oh, nein, das stimmt nicht! -Der große Poirot weiß es.

translation.en: -Do you have any evidence? -Do I need evidence? It is all here.

translation.en: No, you definitely need evidence.
The policeman has provided evidence that it was the maid, so it was the maid what done it.

translation.en: -This man is an oaf. -Okay, right.
That's not how these work. The maid did it.

translation.en: It was me. Yes. And there's no way you're going to take me to prison.
translation.de: Ja, ich war's. Aber ich gehe nicht ins Gefängnis.

translation.en: -I'm out of here now! -[Michael] Take this woman!
-No! -Take this woman!
The great Poirot knew all along.
translation.de: Der große Poirot wusste es die ganze Zeit.

translation.en: I needed to get that out of her.
translation.de: Ich musste es ihr nur entlocken.

translation.en: And she did it in the end. She panicked and admitted it.
translation.de: Am Ende ist sie in Panik geraten und hat gestanden.

translation.en: -I knew it. All along. -Right.
Poirot's having a bit of a shocker at the office today, isn't he?
All great sleuths have their off days.

translation.en: Today was such a day.
[Jack] This is the best murder mystery ever.
For the next leg of our journey, Hilary was sending us to the Whitehall family's ancestral seat:

A place known for its ragged coastlines, beautiful mountains,

translation.de: dass es dreimal mehr Schafe als Menschen gibt.

translation.en: We could still take them.
Do you want a Flump?
No, thank you.
How long is this drive? Six hours?
translation.de: Wie lang ist die Fahrt? Sechs Stunden?

translation.en: -No, I don't think it's as long as that. -I think it is.
-Do you? -Yeah.
With your granny driving, probably six hours.

translation.en: I'm gonna try and sleep.
What the fuck is that?
You're like the Elephant Man!
[chuckles] It's my travel pillow.
You can sleep anywhere. You can sleep to the side.
You can sleep everywhere.
So, you're going through one of the most beautiful parts of the country,
translation.de: Du fährst durch eine wunderschöne Gegend

translation.en: and you can't see anything
because you've got some stupid Elephant Man hat on.

translation.en: It's not an Elephant Man hat.
It's my ostrich head sleeping pillow.
And I cannot sleep in a car now without it. [Michael] It looks like a gray bollock.

translation.en: -Shall I put on some music? -Don't put on music.
No? I've got some good tunes, mate.
I've loaded something up there for you to play.
What?
Because this trip's about our family and our heritage, and all that.

translation.en: I thought you'd enjoy it.
No, let's get some club classics.
-No, just put this on. -What, here?
Yeah.
This?
[Michael on stereo] Chapter One: Keeping Up Appearances.
-Are you joking? -Around the time Adolf Hitler--
-What do you mean, joking? -This is your audiobook.
Yeah.
You have loaded up the audiobook
to your own autobiography for us to listen to.
Yes, so you can listen about your family and your heritage and life.
translation.de: Ja, damit du was über die Familiengeschichte erfährst.

translation.en: -Do you have any idea how weird that is? -Yeah.
-Sure. -You're literally listening to yourself.
Yeah. Yeah, I mean, I was reading it…

translation.en: But I thought you'd enjoy it. I mean, what else are you gonna do?
translation.de: Ich dachte, es gefällt dir. Was willst du sonst machen?

translation.en: -At least it'll help me go to sleep. -Shh!
…traveling around the country as a gas instructor in the RAF.
translation.de: …reiste für die Royal Air Force durch das Land.

translation.en: -No one pictured him… -Can you turn yourself down?
Both versions of you.
…as a pilot with a fur-lined flying jacket.
-Stereo Michael Whitehall. -…dark silk cravat.
This could break a terrorist.
It was against…
It was about a Spanish film.

translation.en: was an American casting director with a rather flaky reputation.
translation.de: war eine amerikanische Besetzungschefin mit fragwürdigem Ruf.

translation.en: -"No, I haven't, but it'll be fine." -What the fuck?
-Daddy! -What?
-Why have you done that? -I didn't want you to miss this bit.
translation.de: -Was sollte das? -Das sollst du nicht verpassen.

translation.en: It's with Judy Dench.
-What? -She's so funny.
Judy Dench stuck her head round the corner.
translation.de: Judy Dench steckte ihren Kopf um die Ecke.

translation.en: "Did you know there's a wedding reception going on in there, Michael?"
translation.de: "Wusstest du, dass da ein Hochzeitsempfang läuft?",

translation.en: she said and disappeared.
The trouble with St. John's Church, William,
translation.de: Das Problem mit der Kirche St. John's in William war,

translation.de: dass sie nicht in William war.

translation.en: There was a church in William, but it wasn't St. John's…
translation.de: Da war eine Kirche in William, aber es war nicht St. John's…

translation.en: [Jack] After that historical journey, we arrived at Palé Hall Hotel,
translation.de: Nach dieser geschichtsträchtigen Reise erreichten wir das Palé Hall Hotel,

translation.en: at the foothills of Mount Snowdon.
We were meeting Hilary
to celebrate the fact that today is my parents' 35th wedding anniversary.
translation.de: um den 35. Hochzeitstag meiner Eltern zu feiern.

translation.en: [Jack] This looks nice.
[Michael] Very nice.
We've got a big one tonight, your mother and I.
translation.de: Es ist ein wichtiger Tag für deine Mutter und mich.

translation.en: Do you realize that?
-The anniversary? -Yeah.
-It's-- -Thirty-five years?
-Yeah. It's a big one. -Amazing.
If you see my hat outside the door of the room, then you'll know…
translation.de: Wenn mein Hut vor der Tür liegt, dann weißt du…

translation.en: we're in action.
Might see if this hotel has any outhouses I can stay in.
translation.de: Vielleicht gibt es ein Außengebäude, in dem ich schlafen kann.

translation.en: I hope you've packed plenty of earplugs, too,

translation.en: I might not even be checking into this hotel at this rate.
translation.de: Vielleicht checke ich gar nicht erst ein.

translation.en: -Don't worry if-- -Wow.
-If you hear screaming-- -Shut up. Look!
-[Jack] Isn't this beautiful? -Very nice.
Why would anyone want to build a house like that in Wales?
translation.de: Wer baut denn so ein Haus in Wales?

No comments like that when we get out of this car.
-That's me. Hello, how are you? -How are you? How was your journey?
translation.de: -Das bin ich. Hallo, wie geht's? -Wie war die Anreise?

translation.en: -Very well. Very good. -Welcome to Palé Hall.
-Hey, how are you, mate? -Very good.
Have you got a beautiful young lady in here waiting for me?

translation.en: -I'm sure we do. -[Jack] Beautiful young lady?
Please don't talk about my mother like that.
translation.de: Sag so was nicht über meine Mutter.

translation.en: -Beautiful, young… Well-built, buxom… -[Jack] Stop!
-[Jack, sing-song] Hello! -[Hilary] Hello, hello, hello!
-Hello. -Lovely to see you, Momsies.
-Would you like to kiss Winston? -No, I wouldn't.
-Hello, Winston. -Say hello, Winston.
Hello, bubs.
-You look lovely. -Thank you.
Happy anniversary!
-Yes! -[Hilary] How's it been?
-Thirty-five years. -Long.
-Not as long as 35 years. -Not as long as 35 years. Indeed.
translation.de: -Nicht so lang wie 35 Jahre. -Nicht so lang. Stimmt.

translation.en: -[Hilary] So… -[Michael] Lovely.
The reason I've booked this beautiful five-star hotel
is because you're going to be here tonight having dinner, etc.
translation.de: weil du heute Abend hier isst.

translation.en: -Our wedding anniversary. -It is our wedding anniversary.
But I'm afraid there's a little bit of a twist this year,
translation.de: Aber dieses Jahr gibt es etwas Neues,

translation.en: as there's an exciting camping experience I'd like Jack and I to do.
translation.de: weil ich will, dass Jack und ich zelten gehen.

translation.en: And as I always took you kids camping,
translation.de: Ich war immer mit euch zelten

translation.en: I thought we could recreate a bit of that together on our last trip.
translation.de: und wollte das auf unserer letzten gemeinsamen Reise wiederholen.

translation.en: We're camping and he'll stay in the 5-star hotel?
-Yeah. -I think that's a pretty good setup.
Happy about that?
No.
Cockblock.
The only thing is you're not going to be alone, though,
translation.de: Aber du wirst dabei nicht allein bleiben,

translation.en: because…
I don't think Winston should come camping.
translation.de: Winston soll nicht mit zelten gehen.

translation.en: The other thing I should just point out,
translation.de: Und ich muss noch etwas sagen,

translation.de: Du durftest in Chartwell nicht in Winston Churchills Bad oder Bett.

translation.en: The big news is that Winston Churchill stayed here. There is a Winston Churchill suite.
translation.de: Aber Churchill hat auch hier übernachtet. Es gibt eine Churchill-Suite.

translation.en: Really?
So, we're going round the country,
so that I can get into baths and beds
translation.de: damit ich in die Bäder und Betten steigen kann,

translation.en: that have previously been occupied by Winston Churchill.
translation.de: in denen Winston Churchill mal gelegen hat.

translation.en: -Is that it? -That's the thought.
Fine, okay. Well, I'm going to celebrate my wedding anniversary on my own…
translation.de: Okay. Ich feiere den Hochzeitstag allein…

translation.en: -No! -…with a doll…
-That sounds worse. -…in Winston Churchill's bed.
Don't tell anyone in the hotel
that you'll be celebrating your wedding anniversary in bed with a doll.

translation.en: -They might get the wrong idea… -No, I won't.
…or possibly the right one.
We head to the island of Anglesey,

translation.en: where Mommy reveals to me that we're not just going camping,
translation.de: wo Mummy enthüllt, dass wir nicht einfach zelten,

where you sleep off the side of a cliff.
translation.de: an einer steilen Felswand hängen wird.

translation.en: -Nah, not for me, this one. -[dramatic music playing]
Mommy and I will be spending the night high above the water and the rocks,

translation.en: directly against the cliff face,
on that, a rickety stretcher dangling from a piece of string.
translation.de: auf einer klapprigen Liege, die an einem Bindfaden hängt.

translation.en: So, I think it's just up here.
-Hello! -Hello!
-Hey. -I'm Sam.
-Hey, Sam. -I'm Hilary.
-Do you know what we're doing? -It looks quite terrifying.
With the evening fast approaching,
it's time to get on our equipment and literally throw ourselves off a cliff.
translation.de: und wir mussten uns schnell von der Klippe schmeißen.

translation.en: [Jack] Oh God. It really is a cliff.
-Why don't you just bring that up here? -[Sam laughs]
translation.de: Warum ziehst du das nicht hoch?

translation.en: I've got down to this bit and I'll lower my ass, and you just place it on my ass.
translation.de: Ich bleibe hier hocken, und du ziehst das bis zu meinem Arsch.

translation.en: Then we're good to go.
-[Sam] That's it, Jack. -[grunts]
Oh, fuck.
Oh, what's that creaking?
Shut up, Hilary.
There's no creaking, Mother.
With me safely in position,
it was Hilary's turn to gracefully descend.
-I've got to get over here, haven't I? -[Sam] Yeah, that's it.
My mother, in a tightly-packed harness, being winched on top of me.
translation.de: Meine Mutter wurde in einem Geschirr auf mich herabgelassen.

translation.en: Just cut my rope now!
Oh my God. I definitely should have gone second.
translation.de: Oh, Gott. Ich hätte als Zweiter absteigen sollen.

translation.en: Please don't make me laugh. I go all weak when I…

translation.en: I can't look down and I can't look up.
-[Sam] Hilary, keep yourself on-- -[Hilary] This side?
-[Sam] Yeah. -Step over this one.
-Yeah, alright. -No, you're behind it, Mommy.
-I know I am. -You're too low.
-Get over there. -Don't make me laugh.
Put your weight on there, Hilary.
-I'm sorry. -Lower. Lower.
-Okay? -I've got hysterical, sorry.
[Jack] No…
-[Sam] Why don't you turn around? -[Hilary] Oh, yes, I will.
Maybe one at a time. Slow, steady movements.
translation.de: Einer nach dem anderen. Schön langsam.

translation.en: Right, I'm definitely going first this time…
Went first… Why are you going first?
I'm just getting it over and done with.
translation.de: Ich will es nur hinter mich bringen.

translation.en: Ooh, fucking hell. Please don't do that.
translation.de: Oh, verdammte Scheiße. Bitte mach das nicht.

translation.en: -[yells] Oh, fuck. -Jack, what are you doing? I'm trying to get round.
How's it going there, Jack?
-Yeah. -Yeah? Good?
-I mean, the view is spectacular. -I'm really not that into this.
translation.de: -Der Blick ist spektakulär. -Das gefällt mir wirklich nicht.

translation.en: I'm loving this, Jack.
Where's your spirit of adventure?
I left it at the top of the cliff.
You're sounding, can I just say, like the son of your father.
translation.de: Darf ich sagen, dass du wie der Sohn deines Vaters klingst?

translation.en: -[waiter] Mr. Whitehall, how are we? -Very well, thank you.
translation.de: -Mr. Whitehall, wie geht es? -Sehr gut, danke.

translation.en: -Can I pour your tea for you? -Thank you.
-And would he like some? -Definitely.
You'd like tea, wouldn't you, Winston,
with Daddy?
[Hilary] So, the final adventure.
[Jack] It might be if we never make it off this platform.
I don't mean this moment. I mean the whole journey with your dad.
translation.de: Ich meine nicht diesen Moment, sondern die ganze Reise mit deinem Vater.

translation.en: How's it been?
-Yeah, it's been lovely. -Yeah?
It's been very nice to be back on the road with him.
translation.de: Es war schön, wieder mit ihm zu reisen.

translation.en: I didn't think we'd be back on the road again, but I'm very thankful
translation.de: Ich dachte, das machen wir nie wieder, aber ich bin sehr dankbar,

translation.en: that we are back, traveling together.
translation.de: dass wir noch einmal zusammen reisen.

translation.en: Obviously, it's been a very, very weird year.
translation.de: Es war ein sehr seltsames Jahr.

translation.en: -It was also scary. -It was scary.
Scary not seeing you and also just not knowing… Yeah.
translation.de: -Euch nicht zu sehen und nicht zu wissen… -Ja.

translation.en: With Molly being pregnant as well and all of that going on at the same time…
translation.de: Und dann war Molly auch noch schwanger…

translation.en: Like, the relief when she gave birth
and she sent me those pictures of you and Daddy with Peggy,
translation.de: als sie mir die Bilder von dir und Daddy mit Peggy geschickt hat.

translation.en: [voice breaks] and I was just so thankful and so happy, and seeing Daddy holding her…
translation.de: Ich war so dankbar und glücklich, und wie Daddy sie gehalten hat…

translation.en: -I know. -And I was, like…
I was so happy that we got to that moment
and he got through it, and you got through it,
translation.de: Und er hat es überstanden, und du hast es überstanden.

translation.en: and you were with your granddaughter and seeing how happy you both were…
translation.de: Ihr habt eure Enkelin gesehen, und ihr wart beide so glücklich.

translation.en: It was just, like… Just a relief.
translation.de: Es war ein Gefühl der Erleichterung.

translation.en: I shall never take it for granted, getting to hang out with you and Daddy,
translation.de: Ich werde immer dankbar dafür sein, wenn ich mit dir und Daddy abhängen kann,

translation.en: even if it is over a cliff.
You know, we've had time to think during the last year and we've had a major decision.
translation.de: Wir haben viel nachgedacht und eine wichtige Entscheidung getroffen.

translation.en: -I'm sure your father has told you. -No.
This is so classic of your father.
translation.de: Das ist so typisch für deinen Vater.

translation.en: I gave him one job to do.
translation.de: Er sollte nur eine Sache machen.

translation.en: -You're putting Winston up for adoption? -No.
-Because I would be fully supportive. -I know you would be.
-I'd drive him to the orphanage. -[sighs]
translation.de: Ich würde ihn ins Waisenhaus fahren.

translation.en: There may be a bit of mileage being put between you and Winston
translation.de: Du wirst aber weiter von Winston entfernt sein,

translation.en: because your father and I have decided we're going to move out of London.
translation.de: weil dein Vater und ich aus London wegziehen.

translation.en: -You're moving out of London? -Yeah.
-Nah. -Yeah.
Because you now are settled with your girlfriend,
translation.de: Du hast jetzt deine feste Freundin,

translation.en: Molly and Toby have had Peggy, so we're now grandparents,
translation.de: Molly und Toby haben Peggy, wir sind Großeltern,

translation.en: and we just feel that we need to change it up a bit.
translation.de: und wir wollen einfach mal etwas Neues machen.

translation.en: I can't believe Daddy didn't tell you all this.
translation.de: Das hat Daddy dir nicht erzählt?

translation.en: -No. -He hasn't mentioned it at all?
No, he's mainly been making dodgy comments about the Welsh.
translation.de: Nein, er macht nur fiese Kommentare über die Waliser.

translation.en: [whispering] Fuck!
You've got Daddy over a barrel here, Winston, and you know it.
translation.de: Du hast Daddy in der Hand, Winston, und das weißt du.

translation.en: What I have done, though, Jack, to celebrate this moment, is I've prepared some supper.
translation.de: Ich habe zur Feier des Augenblicks etwas zu essen vorbereitet.

translation.en: -[Sam] Here it comes. You ready? -Yep! Thank you very, very much.
Just remember, anything you drop is probably not coming back.
translation.de: Wenn ihr was fallen lasst, kommt es nicht wieder.

translation.en: Yeah, got it.
[Sam] What have you got?
I've got some Chinese from Gordon Ramsay's restaurant, the Lucky Cat.
translation.de: Chinesisches Essen aus Gordon Ramsays Restaurant Lucky Cat.

translation.en: -Yeah. -Are you joking?
-Yeah, no, I have. -From a week ago?
-Here, look. -I'm not eating that!
-Look. -What, all that stuff?
-It's lovely, look. -[coughs]
That's disgusting.
I'm not having some old flabby gyoza that's been in the fridge for a week.
translation.de: Ich esse keine alten Gyoza, die eine Woche lang im Kühlschrank lagen.

translation.en: Just try one.
-Just try it. -It's all cold and flabby.
translation.de: -Probier es einfach. -Es ist kalt und labbrig.

translation.en: It looks like one of Daddy's testicles.
translation.de: Das sieht aus wie Daddys Eier.

translation.en: -That is so mean! -What?
-On the food or his testicles? -Daddy's testicles. It's so mean.
translation.de: -Für das Essen oder seine Eier? -Daddys Eier. Das ist so fies.

translation.en: What the fuck is that?
-Do you remember that lovely fish you did? -The road-killed fish?
translation.de: -Erinnerst du dich an den Fisch? -Den von der Straße?

translation.en: -You've brought it with you to Wales? -Yep.
-Look. -It's a week old. Fuck!
I'm actually gagging.
-You're a monster. -That's a bit fruity, even for me.
translation.de: -Du bist ein Monster. -Der ist selbst für mich etwas überreif.

translation.en: [Jack] I think I'm about to chunder onto a puffin.
translation.de: Ich kotze gleich auf einen Papageitaucher.

translation.en: It's time for me to take control of this final trip.
translation.de: Ich muss diese letzte Reise in die Hand nehmen.

translation.en: We need to do some things we'll regret, whether Daddy likes it or not.
translation.de: Wir machen Sachen, die wir später bereuen, ob es Daddy gefällt oder nicht.

translation.en: Please, no, Max! [yelps]
[man] Let go of…
Jack, can you just fuck off? Because you're just causing havoc.
translation.de: Jack, verpisst du dich bitte? Du sorgst nur für Chaos.

translation.en: Do you want a little cuddle?
-No! Move it away! -Ow, Daddy!
Look, fuck off!
You're a cheat.
-I'm not a cheat. -You are, you're a cheat!
